Harry Potter - I would choose to become Harry Potter because of his incredible journey of self-discovery and overcoming adversity. I am drawn to his bravery, determination, and his ability to stand up for what is right.

Hermione Granger - I would choose to become Hermione Granger because of her intelligence, resourcefulness, and her unwavering loyalty to her friends. I admire her dedication to learning and her ability to think critically in high-pressure situations.

Elizabeth Bennet - I would choose to become Elizabeth Bennet because of her wit, intelligence, and her ability to navigate complex social situations. I admire her independence and her ability to make her own decisions.

Frodo Baggins - I would choose to become Frodo Baggins because of his bravery, humility, and his ability to carry the weight of the world on his shoulders. I admire his willingness to sacrifice his own desires for the greater good.

Wonder Woman - I would choose to become Wonder Woman because of her strength, compassion, and her ability to fight for justice and equality. I admire her unwavering commitment to doing what is right, even in the face of overwhelming odds.
